data.title: WALT DISNEY’S BARN
data.meta_description:
47 reviews and 365 photos of WALT DISNEY'S BARN "Disclaimer -- I'm a ginormous Disney geek!

Back in the "olden days" of Hollywood, Walt Disney lived in Holmby Hills and had a really amazing train set in his back yard that he would show off to visitors and take them riding on.

He also had this barn where he worked on the trains and that's what this is!

It used to be at his house, but some crazy person bought Walt's house and LEVELED it!  (Who in their right mind would destroy Walt Disney's house?!)

So, the Carolwood Pacific Society disassembled it and rebuilt it in Griffith Park at the Los Angeles Live Steamers.

If you're way into Disney or trains, I'd say you should definitely visit.

And if you have kids, I'd at the very least recommend visiting the Los Angeles Live Steamers -- riding the trains is way cool!

Check the website for hours.  The barn is typically only open the 3rd Sunday of each month!

http://www.carolwood.com"
data.text:
“It's only open on the third Sunday of each month from 11AM to 3PM, weather permitting (i.” in 10 reviews

“Everyone seemed to be having a good time, almost like being at Disneyland but without the long drive and rides.” in 16 reviews
